jobDescription: Our mission is to help people everywhere find a job and company they love. We are disrupting an industry by changing how people search for jobs and how companies recruit top talent.  We’re looking for a passionate, skilled and driven Sr. Software Engineer in Test to help us take our product to the next level for our San Francisco office. At Glassdoor you’ll have the freedom to leverage your intuition, creativity and expertise to help one of the top job sites in the world to continue its rapid expansion.  A typical week includes working with Product Managers and fellow Engineers to understand and clarify new feature requests that support Glassdoor’s business goals. You will collaborate with fellow Software Engineers in Test to discover new ways of creating and executing tests. By providing guidance on testing methodologies, you will help keep the entire team accountable for the quality of work released in our biweekly sprints. Finally, you will push new efficiencies with your team, from promoting test coverage to creating new tools and evangelizing automation best practices. Responsibilities Our ideal candidate will have experience with various automation frameworks, a strong understanding of QA best practices, and a passion for quality. Object oriented programming experience and navigating Linux environments is also a necessity.  As a late stage startup, we look for self-starters who thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment – which means wearing multiple hats, being able to change direction quickly, and showing an eagerness to learn new technologies as the need arises. In this role you work with a cross-functional, collaborative environment – so excellent interpersonal and communication skills are also a must. And most importantly – we look for people who can prioritize, multi-task, and deliver.
